key_risks: Regulatory challenges from ANACOM impacting profitability
Intense competition from Vodafone Portugal and Altice Portugal
High debt levels limiting investment in growth initiatives
Customer service issues affecting retention and brand reputation
controversies: Fines and regulatory adjustments due to pricing practices and market dominance
Billing errors and service disruptions leading to customer dissatisfaction
environmental_issues: Carbon footprint reduction and renewable energy investments
social_issues: Customer service challenges and billing errors
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny and compliance with ANACOM regulations
